title: Did Nancy Pelosi Remove a 150-Year-Old ‘In God We Trust’ Sign from the House Chamber Entrance?
subtitle: Curiously, the phrase "In God We Trust" wasn't even on paper currency in the United States 150 years ago.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Nancy Pelosi removed a 150-year-old sign reading "In God We Trust" from the entrance to the U.S. House of Representatives Chamber.
